name: Artificial Knowledge: Prequel Collection
description:
Artificial Knowledge is a large project that I have been planning to create ever since.  I've had tough times to develop so many ideas to plan out how I can set up an interesting and sensible storyline.  It'll take a long journey in time for me to release more content on this series and the lore included.  (One other thing: this series may be meant to look "anime" illustrated.) On to what the series is about:

Artificial Knowledge takes place somewhere in the future where humanity is at a large-scaled battle against every unit of the entire rogue AI population worldwide.  As time passed by since the "main incident", the entire body count decreases, and the human race is scattered all around.  Up until now, they start to regroup entirely of whoever is left alive and repel the full occupation of artificial intelligence and find the source of the cause that started the entire battle, and cease it from occurring ever again.

Release Status of Artificial Knowledge mini-games:

  • AK Small Teaser - Released
  • AK: The Gathering - In development
  • AK: Blind Sights - Not Started
  • AK: Pacified Escape - Not Started
  • AK: Pre-Series - In development

This page will be updated once there are changes confirmed.

Check out my YouTube channel(s) below:
